author: Erin Hale
title: World opinion shifts in favour of masks as virus fight deepens
description: US latest country to back wider use of face masks that have long been used in Asia and could reduce coronavirus risk.
content: Taipei, Taiwan - The United States is now urging people to wear face masks when they go outside amid growing evidence suggests that even a simple cloth mask can be an effective tool against the coronavirus if it is used correctly, according to health experts.… [+5758 chars]
